ValidationRule.description: Scale rule. If NJSLA is blank then fire this rule.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Policy_Active__c && Override_Policy_VR__c = false &&
AND(ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, "Policy Delivered / Closed Won"), $RecordType.Name = "Scale", ISBLANK(NJSLA__c), OR(Account__r.BillingState = "New Jersey", Account__r.ShippingState = "New Jersey"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: NJSLA cannot be blank for NJ policies.
